text: is a former Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Aoki was born on April 10, 1929. He played for Chiyoda Life. On January 5, 1955, he debuted for the Japan national team against Burma. ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1955||1||0 |- !Total||1||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:Japan international footballers Category:2014 deaths Category:Association football defenders
